.lazy-placeholder {
  display: none; }

.owl-carousel {
  display: block; }

#hero-carousel .view-mode-home-hero {
  animation: none; }

#hero-carousel article {
  display: none; }
  #hero-carousel article:first-child {
    display: block; }

@media screen and (min-width: 992px) {
  #hero-carousel .card-block {
    animation: none; } }

.card-small .primary-category-link,
.card-small .field--name-field-subhead,
.card-small .field--name-field-display-headline,
.card-small h3 a, .card-medium .primary-category-link,
.card-medium .field--name-field-subhead,
.card-medium .field--name-field-display-headline,
.card-medium h3 a, .card-large .primary-category-link,
.card-large .field--name-field-subhead,
.card-large .field--name-field-display-headline,
.card-large h3 a {
  text-indent: unset;
  background: none; }
